title: Lala Kent stuns in silk top and skirt with beau Randall Emmett at The Irishman premiere in Paris
text:
Lala Kent dazzled on the red carpet in Paris Thursday at the premiere of The Irishman at la Cinematheque with her fiance Randall Emmett, who is a producer on the Martin Scorsese crime drama.

The 29-year-old Vanderpump Rules star donned a sleek one-shoulder Bibhu Mohapatra dress with a creme top and black skirt, and sandal heels by Gianvito Rossi.

Kent kept warm with a lime green shawl and had her blonde locks neatly pulled back with diamond earrings at the Parisian cinematic event.

Opening night: Lala Kent, 29, dazzled on the red carpet in Paris Thursday at the premiere of The Irishman at la Cinematheque with her fiance Randall Emmett, 48

Emmett, 48, who got engaged to Kent last year during a Cabo San Lucas, Mexico vacation, donned an all-black suit with Louis Vuitton sneakers as he walked the red carpet.

She later took to Instagram with a serious shot of the two outside of the Four Seasons in Paris, writing, 'We’re smiling on the inside.'

Kent also tagged the designers Mohapatra and Rossi, and her stylist Alexandra Renee Scott, into the post.

The couple has made headlines over the past year for their back-and-forth squabbles with 50 Cent, who worked with Emmett on the show Power.

Gorgeous: The Vanderpump Rules star donned a sleek Bibhu Mohapatra dress with a creme top and black skirt, and sandal heels by Gianvito Rossi

Happy: The reality star beamed in the City of Light for the debut of the film

Movers and shakers: Randall is a producer on the Martin Scorsese crime drama along with the famed filmmaker, actor Robert De Niro, and others

Sleek: Kent had her blonde locks neatly pulled back with diamond earrings

50 Cent and the movie producer had a falling out this past April as the Candy Shop rapper took to social media complaining about Emmett's $1 million debt to him (that he later settled).

The situation went viral as 50 Cent shared texts Emmett had sent him about the financial issue, specifically one in which a typo led him to call the rapper 'Fofty.'

The famed director Scorsese was also snapped at the Thursday premiere, clad in a navy blue pinstriped suit with a vest.

Fame: The Bravo beauty smiled as she posed on the red carpet

Group shot: (L-R) Lala, The Irishman's Academy Award-winning filmmaker Martin Scorsese, producer Emma Tillinger Koskoff and Emmett posed together

Luxe life: Lala took to Instagram with a serious shot outside of the Four Seasons in Paris

The Academy Award-winning filmmaker has assembled an ensemble cast of stars for the mob period piece, which is based on the 2004 book I Heard You Paint Houses.

They included Robert De Niro, Al Pacino and Joe Pesci, as well as Anna Paquin, Harvey Keitel and Ray Romano.

The Irishman is slated to debut on Netflix November 27, as well as in select theaters.

Living legend: Scorsese was snapped at the Thursday premiere, clad in a navy blue pinstripe suit with a vest

Adoring public: The director of classics such as Taxi Driver, Goodfellas and Cape Fear soaked in applause at the theater

Beauty: Actress Marie-Jose Croze donned a grey coat and jeans at the debut of the film
description: The 29-year-old Vanderpump Rules star donned a sleek one-shoulder Bibhu Mohapatra dress with a creme top and black skirt, and sandal heels by Gianvito Rossi.
